00016     void Process::run() {
00017 
00018         try {
00019             int n_events_processed = 0;
00020 
00021             // first, notify everyone that we are starting
00022             for (auto module : sequence_) {
00023                 module->onProcessStart();
00024             }
00025 
00026             // if we have no input files, but do have an event number, run for that number of events on an output file
00027             if (inputFiles_.empty() && eventLimit_ > 0) {
00028                 EventFile outFile(outputFiles_[0], true);
00029 
00030                 for (auto module : sequence_) {
00031                     module->onFileOpen(outputFiles_[0]);
00032                 }
00033 
00034                 EventImpl theEvent(passname_);
00035                 outFile.setupEvent(&theEvent);
00036 
00037                 while (n_events_processed < eventLimit_) {
00038                     EventHeader& eh = theEvent.getEventHeaderMutable();
00039                     eh.setRun(runForGeneration_);
00040                     eh.setEventNumber(n_events_processed + 1);
00041                     eh.setTimestamp(TTimeStamp());
00042 
00043                     theEvent.getEventHeader()->Print();
00044 
00045                     for (auto module : sequence_) {
00046                         if (dynamic_cast<Producer*>(module)) {
00047                             (dynamic_cast<Producer*>(module))->produce(theEvent);
00048                         } else if (dynamic_cast<Analyzer*>(module)) {
00049                             (dynamic_cast<Analyzer*>(module))->analyze(theEvent);
00050                         }
00051                     }
00052                     outFile.nextEvent();
00053                     theEvent.Clear();
00054                     n_events_processed++;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 for (auto module : sequence_) {
00058                     module->onFileClose(outputFiles_[0]);
00059                 }
00060                 outFile.close();
00061 
00062             } else {
00063                 if (!outputFiles_.empty() && outputFiles_.size() != inputFiles_.size()) {
00064                     EXCEPTION_RAISE("Process", "Unable to handle case of different number of input and output files (other than zero output files)");
00065                 }
00066                 // next, loop through the files
00067                 int ifile = 0;
00068                 int wasRun = -1;
00069                 for (auto infilename : inputFiles_) {
00070                     EventFile inFile(infilename);
00071 
00072                     std::cout << "Process: Opening file " << infilename << std::endl;
00073                     EventFile* outFile(0);
00074 
00075                     if (!outputFiles_.empty()) {
00076                         outFile = new EventFile(outputFiles_[ifile], &inFile);
00077                         ifile++;
00078 
00079                         for (auto rule : dropKeepRules_) {
00080                             outFile->addDrop(rule);
00081                         }
00082                     }
00083 
00084                     for (auto module : sequence_) {
00085                         module->onFileOpen(infilename);
00086                     }
00087 
00088                     EventImpl theEvent(passname_);
00089                     if (outFile) {
00090                         outFile->setupEvent(&theEvent);
00091 
00092                     } else {
00093                         inFile.setupEvent(&theEvent);
00094                     }
00095                     EventFile* masterFile = (outFile) ? (outFile) : (&inFile);
00096 
00097                     while (masterFile->nextEvent() && (eventLimit_ < 0 || (n_events_processed) < eventLimit_)) {
00098 
00099                         // notify for new run if necessary
00100                         if (theEvent.getEventHeader()->getRun() != wasRun) {
00101                             wasRun = theEvent.getEventHeader()->getRun();
00102                             try {
00103                                 const RunHeader& runHeader = masterFile->getRunHeader(wasRun);
00104                                 std::cout << "[Process] got new run header from '" << masterFile->getFileName() << "' ..." << std::endl;
00105                                 runHeader.Print();
00106                                 for (auto module : sequence_) {
00107                                     module->onNewRun(runHeader);
00108                                 }
00109                             } catch (const Exception&) {
00110                                 std::cout << "[Process] [WARNING] Run header for run " << wasRun << " was not found!" << std::endl;
00111                             }
00112                         }
00113 
00114                         TTimeStamp t;
00115                         std::cout << "[ Process ] :  Processing " << n_events_processed + 1 << " Run " << theEvent.getEventHeader()->getRun() << " Event " << theEvent.getEventHeader()->getEventNumber() << "  (" << t.AsString("lc") << ")" << std::endl;
00116 
00117                         for (auto module : sequence_) {
00118                             if (dynamic_cast<Producer*>(module)) {
00119                                 (dynamic_cast<Producer*>(module))->produce(theEvent);
00120                             } else if (dynamic_cast<Analyzer*>(module)) {
00121                                 (dynamic_cast<Analyzer*>(module))->analyze(theEvent);
00122                             }
00123                         }
00124                         n_events_processed++;
00125                     }
00126 
00127                     if (eventLimit_ > 0 && n_events_processed == eventLimit_) {
00128                         std::cout << "[ Process ] : Reached event limit of " << eventLimit_ << " events\n";
00129                     }
00130 
00131                     if (eventLimit_ == 0 && n_events_processed > eventLimit_) {
00132                         std::cout << "[ Process ] : Processing interrupted\n";
00133                     }
00134 
00135                     if (outFile) {
00136                         outFile->close();
00137                     }
00138                     inFile.close();
00139                     std::cout << "Process: Closing file " << infilename << std::endl;
00140                     for (auto module : sequence_) {
00141                         module->onFileClose(infilename);
00142                     }
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 if (histoTFile_) {
00146                     histoTFile_->Write();
00147                     delete histoTFile_;
00148                     histoTFile_ = 0;
00149                 }
00150             }
00151 
00152             // finally, notify everyone that we are stopping
00153             for (auto module : sequence_) {
00154                 module->onProcessEnd();
00155             }
00156         } catch (Exception& e) {
00157             std::cerr << "Framework Error [" << e.name() << "] : " << e.message() << std::endl;
00158             std::cerr << "  at " << e.module() << ":" << e.line() << " in " << e.function() << std::endl;
00159         }
00160     }
00161 
00162     void Process::addToSequence(EventProcessor* mod) {
00163         sequence_.push_back(mod);
00164     }
00165     void Process::addFileToProcess(const std::string& filename) {
00166         inputFiles_.push_back(filename);
00167     }
00168     void Process::addDropKeepRule(const std::string& rule) {
00169         dropKeepRules_.push_back(rule);
00170     }
00171     void Process::setOutputFileName(const std::string& filenameOut) {
00172         outputFiles_.clear();
00173         outputFiles_.push_back(filenameOut);
00174     }
00175 
00176     void Process::setHistogramFileName(const std::string& filenameOut) {
00177         histoFilename_ = filenameOut;
00178     }
00179     void Process::addOutputFileName(const std::string& filenameOut) {
00180         outputFiles_.push_back(filenameOut);
00181     }
00182 
00183     TDirectory* Process::makeHistoDirectory(const std::string& dirName) {
00184         TDirectory* owner;
00185         if (histoFilename_.empty()) {
00186             owner = gROOT;
00187         } else if (histoTFile_ == 0) {
00188             histoTFile_ = new TFile(histoFilename_.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00189             owner = histoTFile_;
00190         } else
00191             owner = histoTFile_;
00192         owner->cd();
00193         TDirectory* child = owner->mkdir((char*) dirName.c_str());
00194         if (child)
00195             child->cd();
00196         return child;
00197     }
00198 }
